author: Xbox
description:
S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl has a free "Stories Untold" content update for you to enjoy! Dive into the Zone for a brand new storyline, which brings:

8 quests that can take hours to complete
7 locations to explore
6 characters with their own backgrounds and stories
A unique weapon 
A hub to create
All of this — completely free for all owners of the game. Christmas arrived earlier in the Zone!
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/p/9P7ZBF3S7PSS/0010

author: Xbox
description:
She's in her element.

Ella Mental is an all-new character to Invincible, here to change the climate of the competition.

Preorder any digital edition of Invincible VS and get Zero Suit Mark skin when the game releases on April 30, 2026.

author: Xbox
description:
Season 2: Play. Duel. Shine.

Season 2 has officially kicked off: new gameplay upgrades, VR arenas, and festive chaos land straight into Rematch.

And this is just the opening move. The heavy hitters are still warming up:
1v1 Duels and the explosive return of the Fireball Mode will arrive later this season, ready to turn rivalries into highlights.

Grab your squad, hit the pitch, and make some noise. Season 2 starts now!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/rematch/9n5k7hwxl4q6

author: Xbox
description:
Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection pulses in on March 27, 2026 for Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One!

Pre-order now to get four bonus musical arrangements as well as Geo Stelar (Casual Wear) and Omega-Xis characters for your Main Menu!

Note: Pre-order bonuses may become available through other means in the future.

Look forward to new upgrades and customizable features like:
- Autosaving
- Camera Panning
- Speed Boost
- Screen Layout
- Encounter Rate
- Mega Buster Power
- Damage Reduction
- HP Recovery After Battle
...and more!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/mega-man-star-force-legacy-collection/9N9T80VW8S7B/0010
